text: Norman Mark Reedus (born January 6, 1969) is an American actor, model and artist. He is known for starring as Daryl Dixon in the AMC series The Walking Dead (2010â€“present) and Murphy MacManus in the movie The Boondock Saints (1999) and its sequel The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day (2009). He is the host of Ride with Norman Reedus. He performed the motion capture and voice acting for the main character Sam in Hideo Kojima's video game Death Stranding (2019). He has also modeled for companies such as Prada and Levi's. Reedus was born in Hollywood, Florida. He has a child with Danish model Helena Christensen. He is now in a relationship with the famous German actress Diane Kruger. The couple have one child. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Florida Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Models from Florida Category:People from Hollywood, Florida
title: Norman Reedus
